unnormalised: Arre yaar, history class-antleo teo soglleo mhotvache tarikho ugddas dovrunk kitlem tras diytale! Mhaka atapori Quit India Movement kedna suru zali tench ghotalta. Ti 8/8/1942 asli ki August-antli anik kosli tarik asli? Ani partition-chi exact vell 15/08/1947-ak zali, tache vixim mat uloi naka. Kitlim tori numbers ugddas dovrunk podtale, bhai! Mhojem dokem phirtaalem.
normalised: Arre yaar, history class-antle te saglle mhotvache tarikho ugddas dovornnk kite tras zatalo! Mhaka azun purnn nirmonn zata Bharat Chodo Andolan kedna suru zalem mhonn. Tem ath August ekunnis sobayallis aslem vo August-antlem dusrem tarik aslem? Ani pandhra August ekunnis sobayallisak zal'lea vibhajonachi niyall tarik mhaka vicharcho naka. Kitle ankde ugddas dovornnk, bhai! Mhajem mathhem bhovrondd martalem.
